member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.ViewModelBase`1.InitAsync
member.summary: Method used to perform async initialization of the viewmodel. This method is usually invoked immediately following construction of the object instance.

member.summary: Override this method to implement async initialization of the model object. The result of this method is used to set the Model property of the viewmodel.
member.returns: A Task that creates the model object.

member.name: T:Csla.Xaml.ISupportNavigation
member.summary: Interface that defines template that Navigatgor control can understand. This interface should be implemented by controls that would rely on Navigator object to show them.

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.ISupportNavigation.SetParameters(System.String)
member.summary: This method is called by Navigatgor in order to pass parameters from a bookmark into the shown control
member.param: Parameters passed as string. Is is up to control to parse them

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.ISupportNavigation.Title
member.summary: Get the title of the control

member.name: E:Csla.Xaml.ISupportNavigation.LoadCompleted
member.summary: This event should be raised after the control is populated with data

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.ISupportNavigation.CreateBookmarkAfterLoadCompleted
member.summary: If set to false, bookamrk will be created as part of navigation. If set to true, bokmakr will be created when LoadCompleted event is raised by the control

member.name: T:Csla.Xaml.NavigationBookmarkProcessedEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments class that is part of Navigator event that is fired after a bookmakr has been processed in response to browser's back or forward button processing.

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.NavigationBookmarkProcessedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: New instance of event arguments
member.param: True if bookamrk was processed successfully.

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.NavigationBookmarkProcessedEventArgs.Success
member.summary: Indicates if bookmakr was processed successfully and control is displayed.

member.name: T:Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs
member.summary: This event arguments class is part of BeforeNavigation event of Navigator.

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: New instance of NavigationEventArgs.
member.param: Assembly qualified name of the control class to display.
Parameters that will be passed to control. Single string is passed in, and controls assumes responcibility for parsing it.
Flag indicating whether the action was initiated by a browser button.

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs.ControlTypeName
member.summary: Assembly qualified name of the control class to display.

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs.Parameters
member.summary: Parameters that will be passed to control. Single string is passed in, and controls assumes responcibility for parsing it. You can modify this parameter string as needed.

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Set to True if you want to cancel from BeforeNavigation event

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs.RedirectToOnCancel
member.summary: If navigation is cancelled, optionaly redirect to the control specified in this property.

member.name: P:Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs.IsInitiatedByBrowserButton
member.summary: If true, the action was intiated by the user clicking on a broser's back or forward button. Otherwise, it was manual navigatio via direct invoke of Navigate method of Navigator

member.name: T:Csla.Xaml.Navigator
member.summary: Class that shows control in a specified container in responce to other controls' events. It is implemented using Singleton pattern, ensuring one instance per application.

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.OnBeforeNavigation(Csla.Xaml.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Method that raises BeforeNavigation event.

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.OnAfterNavigation
member.summary: Method that raises AfterNavigation event.

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.OnAfterBookmarkProcessing(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method that raises AfterBookmarkProcessing event.
member.param: Indicates if bookmakr was successfully processed

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.HandleNavigate(System.Windows.Browser.ScriptObject)
member.summary: Invoked by the browser

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.RegisterNavigator
member.summary: Register navigatgor with the browser in order to subscribe to history events. This methos assumes that Silverlight control that is embedded in the web page has Id of Xaml1

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.RegisterNavigator(System.String,Csla.Xaml.IControlNameFactory)
member.summary: Register navigatgor with the browser in order to subscribe to history events.
member.param: Name of the Silverlight control that is embedded in the web page. Default value is Xaml1
Control name factory to be used with Navigator

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.RegisterNavigator(System.String)
member.summary: Register navigatgor with the browser in order to subscribe to history events.
member.param: Name of the Silverlight control that is embedded in the web page. Default value is Xaml1

member.summary: Show specified control in ContentControl specified by ContentPlaceholder property.
member.param: Assembly qualified control name to show.

member.name: M:Csla.Xaml.Navigator.Navigate(System.String,System.String)

member.param: Assembly qualified control name to show.
String that incorporates parameters needed for new control
